title: REFUND MY SKIN PLEASE
body:
Dear Riot Games,
last night i bought Leona, and i know this sounds cliche but i accidentally bought a skin for her. Please i'm not lying i need a refund. Especially when my favourite kat skin just went on sale, PLEAAASSEEEEE HELP ME. I NEED A REFUND FOR VALKYRIE LEONA SO THAT I CAN BUY SANDSTORM KATARINA... PLEASE I'M GONNA BE OFF TO CAMP TOMORROW I BEG YOU. <3

- N1ncool
